skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns. This debuff cannot be resisted.
skills.name: Exemplar of Skill
skills.books:

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing three 5% [Poison] debuffs for 2 turns. These debuffs cannot be resisted. 

Also increases the duration of all enemy debuffs by 1 turn. This effect cannot be resisted.
skills.name: Putrescence
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Places a 50% [Increase ACC] buff on all allies for 2 turns before attacking.  

Also has a 75% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease RES] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. This debuff cannot be resisted. Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 10% for each [Decrease RES] debuff placed by this skill.
skills.name: Arcane Havoc
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Decreases each target’s ACC, C.RATE, and C.DMG by 3% for each [Poison] debuff on them. If there are multiple Champions on the team with this skill, only one will activate.
skills.name: Degrade [P]
